HALCYON_NO_BUILD_DEPENDENCIES.description: Force haskell-on-heroku to build everything at once.

ALGOLIA_ID.description: Application ID for Algolia search service.

ALGOLIA_KEY.description: API key for Algolia search service.

ALGOLIA_QUERY_BASE.description: Parameters for Algolia searches. This is everything between ? and &query= in the REST query.

ALGOLIA_QUERY_INDEX.description: Algolia application index to query. Setting this to * should work, but is untested.

DATABASE_URL.description: URL for subreddit permissions database. It needs a table named 'subreddits' with columns varchar(22):'subreddit' and bool:'auto'.

REDDIT_OWNER.description: Reddit user to receive direct mail sent to the bot. Note: No mail will be forwarded until the bot's account no longer needs a captcha.

REDDIT_PASS.description: Password for the bot's reddit account.
